features.name: Slot-Based Layout
features.description: Allows developers to assign child elements to specific regions (`left`, `middle`, `right`) within the toolbar using the `slot` prop.

features.name: Structured Design
features.description: Uses an HTML table-based layout to ensure consistent alignment and positioning of elements across the toolbar.

features.name: Customizable Content
features.description: Supports flexible arrangement of children elements, allowing dynamic content in each slot.

features.name: Simple Integration
features.description: Designed for easy integration into React applications with minimal configuration.

props.name: children
props.description: Child elements to be rendered within the toolbar. Each child can specify a `slot` prop to determine its placement (`left`, `middle`, or `right`).
